title: Traditional healing | Young people embracing African spirituality
description: More and more young South Africans are becoming traditional healers, and this includes prominent figures.
cleaned_text: More and more young South Africans are becoming traditional healers, and this includes prominent figures. JOHANNESBURG - More and more young South Africans are becoming traditional healers, and this includes prominent figures. This is particularly important considering that a reported 60 to 80 percent of South Africans consult a traditional healer before they see a primary healthcare practitioner. So why are we seeing an influx of young people into this sacred African practice? Whatever your views are on traditional healing, there's no denying that millennials are embracing it in their numbers. * eNCA contributor Mpho Lakaje reports.
